metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1723 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in app/views/layouts/base.rhtml in Redmine 1.0.1 through 1.1.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the PATH_INFO to projects/hg-helloworld/news/.  NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1723` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 2.4.2-1
redmine-mysql - 2.4.2-1
redmine-pgsql - 2.4.2-1
redmine-sqlite - 2.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-1').
